renewalWaiver.waiverText: Renewal fee waived on annual spends of Rs. 3 Lakhs or more in the preceding year

creditLimit.factors: Based on income, credit score, credit history, and repayment behavior
creditLimit.enhancementCriteria: Good repayment history and income documentation

gracePeriod.note: 20-50 days interest-free period applicable only on retail purchases if previous month's outstanding is paid in full

minPayment.calculation: 100% of GST + 100% of EMI amount + 100% of Fees/Charges + 100% of Finance Charges + Overlimit Amount (if any) + 2% of Remaining Balance Outstanding or Rs 200 (whichever is greater)

rewards.earningText: Earn 2 Reward Points for every Rs. 100 spent on all retail purchases (except fuel)

exclusions.note: No reward points on fuel transactions. Rs. 199 processing fee on rent payments (MCC 6513). 1% fee on wallet loads exceeding Rs. 1,000 (w.e.f. Nov 2025). 1% fee on utility payments exceeding Rs. 50,000/billing cycle (w.e.f. Dec 2024)

birthdayRewards.note: Birthday reward points capped at 2,000 points per calendar year

expiry.condition: Reward Points are valid for 24 months from date of earning. Points not redeemed within this period will expire.

welcome.vouchers: E-gift voucher worth Rs. 3,000 from Yatra, Aditya Birla Fashion, Bata/Hush Puppies, Shoppers Stop, or Pantaloons
welcome.description: Welcome e-gift voucher worth Rs. 3,000 from select brands upon joining

birthday.validity: One day before, on birthday, and one day after

dining.note: 10 Reward Points per Rs. 100 spent on dining (5X accelerated rewards)

groceries.note: 10 Reward Points per Rs. 100 spent on groceries

departmentalStores.note: 10 Reward Points per Rs. 100 spent at departmental stores

movies.note: 10 Reward Points per Rs. 100 spent on movies

fuel.note: No reward points on fuel transactions. 1% fuel surcharge waiver available.

utilities.note: Base 2 Reward Points per Rs. 100. 1% fee on utility payments exceeding Rs. 50,000 per billing cycle (w.e.f. Dec 2024)

international.note: Base reward rate on international transactions

insurance.note: No rewards on insurance payments (from April 2024)

rent.note: No rewards on rent payments. Rs. 199 processing fee applies on all rent payments (MCC 6513)

walletLoads.note: No rewards on wallet loads. 1% fee on wallet loads exceeding Rs. 1,000 (w.e.f. Nov 2025)

education.note: 1% fee on education payments made through third-party apps like CRED, Cheq, MobiKwik (w.e.f. Nov 2025). Direct payments to colleges/schools not charged.

bankPortal.note: SBI Card does not have a shopping portal like HDFC SmartBuy

redemption.bestOption: Gift vouchers or statement credit at 4 RP = Rs. 1

pointsPlusPay.note: Pay card outstanding with reward points at 4 RP = Rs. 1

options.description: Pay card outstanding with reward points
Products from SBI Card rewards catalog
options.note: Physical products require Rs. 99 redemption fee

transferPartners.note: SBI Prime Credit Card does not have airline or hotel transfer partners

calculator.formula: basePoints = (spend / 100) * rate; For accelerated categories (dining, groceries, departmental stores, movies): rate = 10; For other retail: rate = 2; For fuel, rent, wallet, EMI, insurance: rate = 0

spendRequired.note: No spend requirement for domestic lounge access
No spend requirement for Priority Pass lounge access

international.additionalVisitFee: USD 27 + taxes per visit after complimentary visits exhausted

lounge.note: All Airport Lounge visits within India through International Lounge Access Programs (like Priority Pass) will be charged a usage fee of up to USD 27 per visit + taxes

milestones.conditions: Pizza Hut e-Voucher will be sent to registered mobile number within 30 days of achieving spends of Rs. 50,000

milestones.benefit: E-Gift Voucher worth Rs. 7,000 from Yatra.com or Pantaloons
milestones.conditions: SMS to choose e-Gift Voucher option sent within 21 working days of achieving Rs. 5 Lakh spends
Annual fee waived for next year if Rs. 3 Lakh spent in preceding year

golf.discount: Up to 50% off on golf games
golf.note: Golf benefits available with Mastercard variant only. 4 rounds of complimentary green fees access and up to 50% off on golf games along with 1 complimentary lesson per month at selected golf courses across India

movies.note: No standalone movie offers, but 10 Reward Points per Rs. 100 on movie spends

programs.name: SBI Card Dining Offers
programs.note: Up to 20% discount at more than 700+ restaurants including Café Noir, Lord of the Drinks, Yo China, 1441 Pizzeria, The Beer Café and more

hotelDining.offer: Up to 15% discount on best available room rates and up to 15% discount on F&B

fuel.note: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on transaction amount ranging from Rs. 500 to Rs. 4,000 across all petrol pumps. Maximum surcharge waiver of Rs. 250 per statement cycle. GST applicable on surcharge.

forex.markupText: 3.5% foreign currency transaction fee on international transactions

dynamicCurrencyConversion.recommendation: Always decline DCC and pay in local currency

forex.note: Foreign Currency Transaction Fee of 3.5% applicable on all foreign currency transactions. Same rate applies for Dynamic Currency Conversion. Fee will not be reversed in case of transaction refunds.

emi.note: Convert transactions of Rs. 2,500 or more into EMIs within 30 days of purchase via sbicard.com

balanceTransfer.note: Transfer outstanding balance of other banks' credit cards to SBI Card PRIME at lower interest rates. 0% for 60 days or 1.7% p.m. (20.40% p.a.) for 180 days.

memberships.name: Club ITC Silver Tier Membership
memberships.condition: Only eligible cards sourced from 1st September 2025. First transaction within 60 days of card issuance required.
memberships.note: Complimentary 1-year Club ITC Silver Tier Membership with discounts at ITC Hotels

memberships.name: Tablet Plus Membership
memberships.condition: Available with American Express variant only
memberships.note: Complimentary Tablet Plus membership for VIP upgrades and privileges at hotels worldwide

discontinuedMemberships.name: Club Vistara Silver Membership
discontinuedMemberships.note: Previously offered complimentary Club Vistara Silver membership - now discontinued

discontinuedMemberships.name: Trident Privilege Red Tier Membership
discontinuedMemberships.note: Previously offered complimentary Trident Privilege Red Tier membership - now discontinued

eliteStatus.condition: Cards sourced from Sept 2025 onwards only

airAccident.note: Air Accident insurance coverage of Rs. 50 lakhs discontinued with effect from 15 July 2025

fraudLiability.reportingWindow: Valid from 48 hours prior to reporting of loss to 7 days post reporting of loss

insurance.note: Air Accident Liability Cover of Rs. 50 lakhs was offered until 15 July 2025 - now discontinued. Credit card Fraud Liability Cover of Rs. 1 lakh continues to be offered. Insurance provided by Oriental Insurance Company Ltd.

upiLinking.note: RuPay variant can be linked to UPI platforms for payments with base reward earnings

upgradePathway.note: Upgrade eligibility based on spend history, credit score, and relationship with SBI Card

meta.bestFor: Individuals who spend significantly on dining, groceries, movies, and departmental stores and can spend Rs. 5 Lakh annually to maximize milestone benefits
meta.notRecommendedFor: Those seeking premium travel benefits, transfer partners, or low annual fee. Also not ideal for those with low monthly spends.
meta.verdict: SBI Card PRIME is a mid-tier lifestyle card offering 5X rewards on dining, groceries, movies, and departmental stores. The card provides good value for high spenders who can achieve milestone benefits (Rs. 50,000 quarterly for Pizza Hut voucher, Rs. 5 Lakh annually for Rs. 7,000 voucher). Lounge access (8 domestic + 4 international) is a decent perk. However, the base reward rate of 0.5% is low, the annual fee of Rs. 2,999 is relatively high for the benefits, and key travel perks like Club Vistara and Trident memberships have been discontinued. Air accident insurance was also discontinued in July 2025. Better alternatives exist at similar or lower price points.
pros: 5X rewards (10 RP per Rs. 100) on dining, groceries, movies, and departmental stores
Milestone benefits worth up to Rs. 11,000 annually
8 domestic + 4 international lounge visits per year
1% fuel surcharge waiver up to Rs. 250/month
Birthday bonus of 20 RP per Rs. 100 (up to 2,000 RP)
Available in multiple network variants (Visa, Mastercard, RuPay, Amex)
RuPay variant supports UPI linking with rewards
cons: Low base reward rate of 0.5% (2 RP per Rs. 100)
Annual fee of Rs. 2,999 is high for benefits offered
Air accident insurance discontinued from July 2025
Club Vistara Silver and Trident memberships discontinued
No transfer partners for reward points
Processing fee on rent (Rs. 199), wallet loads (1% above Rs. 1,000), utilities (1% above Rs. 50,000)
No rewards on fuel, rent, wallet loads, EMI, and insurance
dataSource: SBI Card MITC document dated December 2025

changelog.change: Club ITC Silver Tier Membership introduced for cards sourced from this date
Air Accident insurance coverage of Rs. 50 lakhs discontinued
1% fee introduced on education payments via third-party apps and wallet loads exceeding Rs. 1,000
1% fee introduced on utility payments exceeding Rs. 50,000 per billing cycle
Reward points on rental payments discontinued for all SBI Credit Cards
